response.answer_text: (Recommended for beginners and university students) (For Windows) Step 1: Download MySQL installer Link: https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQLInstaller/mysql-installer-community-5.5.62.0.msiStep 2: Follow the steps given in video. YouTube Link: How to install MySQL command line client (DBMS)Step 3 : so here, we have successfully installed MySQL. Now just try to create database and use it or just refer the video given below.YouTube Link: Practical 1. DDL Commands in MySQL command line (DBMS PRACTICAL)Thank you, if you found this post helpful, then please hit up-vote button.Visit My website: https://www.chinmaypotdar.ml

Create a my.cnf file in /etc and specify important parameters.  You can find a configure creator at http://tools.percona.comInstall MySQL package for your OS (or use tarball but this is more complex and you need to follow the install directions carefully)Start MySQL, usually: service mysql start
